name: test_e2e_with_logs[029_SQLI_POLY_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_POLY_001` |
| **Name** | Polyglot sleep injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | polyglot |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `SLEEP(1)/*' or SLEEP(1) or '"  or SLEEP(1) or "*/`
- **Encoded**: `SLEEP(1)%2F*'%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20'%22%20%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20%22*%2F`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:16:14.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_POLY_001-1767402974814-doxr0y pattern_id=SQLI_POLY_001 uri=/?q=SLEEP(1)%2F*'%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20'%22%20%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20%22*%2F client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
01:16:14.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_POLY_001-1767402974814-doxr0y pattern_id=SQLI_POLY_001 uri=/?q=SLEEP(1)%2F*'%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20'%22%20%20or%20SLEEP(1)%20or%20%22*%2F client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
